sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By using the services provided by Web3 Research, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms").

sections.title: Eligibility
sections.content: You must be at least 18 years old to use our services. By using our services, you represent and warrant that you meet this requirement.

sections.title: Accounts
sections.content: To access certain features of our services, you must create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

sections.title: Prohibited Uses
sections.content: You agree not to use our services for any unlawful or prohibited purpose. This includes, but is not limited to, using our services to facilitate fraud, money laundering, or the distribution of malware.

sections.title: No Financial Advice
sections.content: Our services may provide information and tools that could be interpreted as financial advice. However, we are not a financial advisor, and any information provided by us is for informational purposes only. You should consult with a qualified professional before making any financial decisions.

sections.title: Risk Disclaimer
sections.content: You acknowledge and agree that using our services involves risks, including the risk of financial loss. You assume all risks associated with your use of our services and agree to hold Web3 Research harmless from any losses or damages resulting from your use of our services.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content and materials provided by Web3 Research are protected by intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or otherwise exploit our content without our express written permission. You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to access and use our services for your personal, non-commercial purposes.

sections.title: Third-Party Links and Services
sections.content: Our services may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by Web3 Research. We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites or services.

sections.title: Termination
sections.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to our services, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including but not limited to your violation of these Terms.

sections.title: Indemnification
sections.content: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Web3 Research, its affiliates, and their respective officers, directors, employees, and agents from and against any and all claims, liabilities, damages, losses, or expenses, including reasonable attorneys' fees and costs, arising out of or in any way connected with your access to or use of our services.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: In no event shall Web3 Research or its affiliates be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including but not limited to, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your access to or use of our services.

sections.title: Governing Law
sections.content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of Hong Kong, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

sections.title: Changes to These Terms
sections.content: We reserve the right to update or modify these Terms at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the updated Terms on this page. Your continued use of our services after any changes to these Terms constitutes your acceptance of the updated Terms.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions or concerns regarding these Terms, please contact us at contact@web3r.tech.
